content:
• Reduced Nightly Rates
  • Spacious Guest Rooms & Sensational Nob Hill Views
  • Business center
  • On site 24 hour fitness center
  • Waived Urban Bundle (savings of $22.80)
  • Fast Free Wifi on all of your devices
  • Same day laundry/dry cleaning
  • Valet Parking Available with in and out Privileges @ $52/day plus tax (additional for oversize vehicles)
  • Bus Parking is available with advance notice. Please contact hotel to make arrangments.

*Perks may vary based on preferred program agreement
